New Records: Cade Cunningham tied an NBA season-high with 10 first-half assists, joining Nikola Jokic, James Harden, and Domantas Sabonis.
Cade Cunningham achieved his 3rd straight triple-double with 22 points, 11 rebounds, and 13 assists.
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham made a game-saving block with less than 10 seconds left to secure the Pistons' win.
The Pistons led by 17 points in the first quarter and 25 points in the second quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Detroit head coach JB Bickerstaff drew up a play to get Cade Cunningham a game-winning basket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons' victory ended a recent losing streak.
Cade Cunningham's clutch performance was highlighted by fans and analysts.
Others: The game was described as an 'epic win' for the Pistons.
